meanings.definition: Decide or determine (an outcome or course of action) beforehand.
meanings.sent1: The fortune teller preordains that you will find success in your future.
meanings.sent2: The weather forecast preordains rain for tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The magic eight ball preordains that you will have a lucky day.
meanings.sent4: The ancient prophecy preordains the rise of a new leader.
meanings.sent5: The wise elder preordains the path to happiness for the young ones.
